First, I need to assess the proximity of the apples to my current position. The closest apples are at (1, 0), (1, 5), and (1, 7), which are all a bit far. I should avoid going up, as there's a potential risk of running into the wall or another snake. In that direction, I see snake #0's head at (9, 5), which is quite far away, but I'll need to keep an eye on it.

Considering my options, I will aim to move down towards the closest apple at (1, 5). I might need to reconsider if I see other opportunities, but for now, down seems like the most logical choice.
